sentences.en: A soldier was arrested after running amok with a vehicle through Berlin.

sentences.en: Drunken troops ran amok in the town.

sentences.en: The field mice , lacking natural predators, have flourished in numbers and are running amok destroying nature.

sentences.en: The sheep started to run amok and the kids too.

sentences.en: Yeeess! - This is political correctness amok.
